title: The Great Escape: Shivaji's Flight from Agra

chapters.title: The Royal Audience
chapters.description: Shivaji meets Aurangzeb in Agra, leading to tension and imprisonment.

chapters.title: The Ingenious Plan
chapters.description: Shivaji devises a clever strategy to escape confinement.

chapters.title: The Execution
chapters.description: Disguised as a trader, Shivaji and his son evade detection and leave Agra.

chapters.title: The Safe Return
chapters.description: Shivaji reaches Maharashtra, triumphing over adversity and ensuring his freedom.
